channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Introduction to GGPLOT2
item.description: Introduction This is a demonstration of creating visualization using ggplot2 ## Starwars plot Starwars Data Analysis library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.5 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.1.6 ✓ dplyr 1.0.7 ## ✓ tidyr 1.2.0 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 2.1.2 ✓ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() glimpse(starwars) ## Rows: 87 ## Columns: 14 ## $ name <chr> "Luke Skywalker", "C-3PO", "R2-D2", "Darth Vader", "Leia Or… ## $ height <int> 172, 167, 96, 202, 150, 178, 165, 97, 183, 182, 188, 180, 2… ## $ mass <dbl> 77.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
